subject: I am Otto J. Donner, Past Fund
body:
I am Otto J. Donner, Past Fund Manager and currently the Associate Director (Private Funds Investments) M&G PLC, Stockholm. I am writing this email to submit an interesting proposal which will enable you to own 30% of any investment return from a business project I'll be
initiating with your consent.
The capital to this project runs to the tune of £47,800,000 which will go into Real Estate and any other profitable business project in your country that can generate our expected return. Your contribution is minimal but essential to the success of this project. In response, I'll provide you with more information.
I'll be looking forward to hearing from you soon and you can reach me with my personal email below.
Yours Sincerely,
Otto J. Donner
ottodjgroup@gmail.com

subject: Re: I am Otto J. Donner, Past Fund
body:
Hello Otto J. Donner,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this intriguing proposal with me. I must say, the idea of being part of a business project sounds quite exciting! 

Could you please provide more details about this project? For instance, what kind of real estate are we talking about? Residential or commercial? And what other profitable business projects do you have in mind?

I'm also curious to know more about my role in this venture. You mentioned that my involvement is minimal but essential. Could you elaborate on that?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Tania

subject: Re: I am Otto J. Donner, Past Fund
body:
Dear Tania,

Thank you for your response on the Investment Proposal. I will be happy to
assist you with more information and give you a broad-view of the proposal
for a better understanding about the partnership. I also apologize for my
delayed response and any inconvenience it may have caused you.

About £122,800,000 was incurred from unclaimed shares running from 2000 -
2021 during my time as the fund manager at M&G plc, London. These funds are
owned by deceased clients which are subsequently bought either by the
company or each of the company shareholders as provided by the company
articles. Not too long, part of the shares that worth £68,800,000 was sold
by the company to fund a new initiative which was bought by a friend
investor but seemingly falls to £47,800,000 in the span of 2 years after
adjusting to inflation. Due to the frustration of the drastic fall of the
shares, it was sold to an American investor for cash with the aim of
investing outside the stock market before he was struck by a stroke.

Due to the reason above, I have been given the mandate to handle and
monitor the affairs of the investment because of the trust he has in me.
Therefore, seeking a trusted partnership for an investment outside of the
stock house where we can invest in some of these businesses like; Oil/Gas
plants, Farming/Agriculture, Healthcare, Transportation or a business like
Real estate, whichever that is suitable for the portfolio manager just like
I mentioned earlier.

To clarify you further, your incredible ideas, management capability and
uprightness is only what will be essential in this partnership. In
agreement for partnership, you will get 5% for receiving the money in your
country, 2.5% for setting up a good investment environment and 30% of any
investment return from the partnership.

If you are upright and interested in partnering with us, kindly send us
your executive summary/business plan for investment review. while a legal
practitioner will draft the necessary documents to be signed and it is
optional but we may sign a Non-Disclosure agreement for your protection
through the transaction.

Lastly, if you are in search of funding support, or instruments to enhance
financial transactions or in need of funding of existing business (Credible
Projects) requiring expansion like listed above, we can also provide an
immediate solution in the form of direct loan at a low interest rate of
2.10% to 3.10% per annum. Your quick response to indicate your kin
interests would be highly appreciated.

Do reach out if you have any more questions. Thank you for your time and
attention to this matter and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Your Sincerely ,
Otto J. Donner
Associate Director

subject: Re: I am Otto J. Donner, Past Fund
body:
Hello Otto J. Donner,

Thank you for your detailed response and the information about the investment proposal. I appreciate your patience and understanding in explaining the situation to me.

I'm intrigued by the idea of investing outside of the stock market, especially in sectors like Oil Gas plants, Farming or Real Estate. It's quite an interesting proposition indeed.

However, I have a few questions that I hope you could help clarify. Firstly, could you provide more details about how these investments would be managed? Who would be responsible for overseeing these investments?

Secondly, regarding the percentage allocation you mentioned - receiving money in my country, setting up good investment and any investment return from it - could you elaborate on this? How exactly would this work?

Lastly, you mentioned providing direct loans at low interest rates. Could you provide more specifics on this? What are the terms and conditions attached to these loans?

I look forward to hearing back from you with more details so we can further discuss this opportunity.

Best wishes,
Tania

subject: Re: I am Otto J. Donner, Past Fund
body:
Hello Otto J. Donner,

Thank you for your detailed response and the information about the investment proposal. I appreciate your patience and understanding in explaining the situation to me.

I'm intrigued by the idea of investing in businesses like Oil Gas plants, Farming or Real Estate. It sounds like a great opportunity! However, I have a few questions that I hope you could help clarify.

Firstly, could you please explain more about how these unclaimed shares came to be? How does it work when shares are bought by the company or each of the company as provided by the company articles?

Secondly, I'm curious about why these funds were sold to an American investor for cash with the aim of investing outside the stock market. What was the reason behind this decision?

Thirdly, could you provide more details on what my role would be in this investment? You mentioned that my ideas and management capability would be essential. Could you elaborate on what exactly is expected from me?

Lastly, regarding funding support and direct loans at low interest rates, could you provide more information on how this works? What are the terms and conditions associated with these loans?

I look forward to hearing back from you soon with answers to my questions. Thank you once again for considering me for this opportunity.

Best wishes,
Tania

subject: Re: I am Otto J. Donner, Past Fund
body:
Hello Tania,

I am writing to confirm the receipt of your email and I apologize for the
delayed response.

To answer your question,  corporation articles are the provisions which
govern the rights of shareholders and representatives of a company.
Accordingly these articles contain rights which will allow directors to
refuse the registration of the transfer or pre-emption rights may apply
whereby the deceased’s shares need to be offered to the existing
shareholders which may not be accounted for in the deceased’s Will. The
articles may also restrict the personal representative right to be
registered as a shareholder or generally to transfer legal title of the
shares from the deceased to the beneficiaries named in the
Will. Pre-emption rights are an effective way to protect the interests of
the remaining shareholders, enabling them to maintain their proportion of
ownership and control.  If the shareholders decline to buy the available
shares they can be offered to third party purchasers including family
members of the deceased and etcetera.

Regarding the reason why we decided to invest outside of the stock market,
the approximately seventy (70%) drop in value of the shares over a two year
period is remarkable enough to leave the stock market and invest in more
physical projects. I believe you'd agree with me on that.

Last and not the least, your role will be to identify areas where a huge
capacity of investment return will be actualized and also to create a
sustainable and convenient investment environment and have direct contact
with the principal investor.

Lastly, We grant the most flexible loan at the lowest interest rate with no
securities needed before approval of the loan. You only need to keep to
your promise of repayment to stand a chance for a higher loan.

I hope this information is enough to give you a better understanding of our
proposal. If you are interested in the partnership, kindly tell us your
business idea or you could send us your executive summary/business plan for
investment review.

Thanks for your patience and understanding as I look forward to hearing
from you.
Regards,
Otto J. Donner

subject: Re: I am Otto J. Donner, Past Fund
body:
Hello Tania,

I am writing this email to request an acknowledgment to my most recent
email. A reply to this email would be appreciated and give us a clue on
what we are working on.

Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing from you.
Regards,
Otto J Donner

subject: Re: I am Otto J. Donner, Past Fund
body:
Hello Tania,

I hope this message finds you well. I received your email and I'm very interested in the details you've shared. Could you please provide more information about what we are working on? It would be really helpful to understand better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Tania

subject: Re: I am Otto J. Donner, Past Fund
body:
Hello Tania,

In response to your email, just like I said earlier, where we can invest in
some of these businesses like; Oil/Gas plants, Farming/Agriculture,
Healthcare, Transportation or a business like Real estate, whichever suits
your country's economy and can bring our expected return. If you have any
different business that is suitable for portfolio management, please let me
know and we review it.

I hope it's well understood now. I look forward to hearing from you.
Best regards,
Otto J Donner

subject: Re: I am Otto J. Donner, Past Fund
body:
Hello Tania,

Thank you for your email. I'm really interested in the investment opportunities you've mentioned, especially in Oil Gas plants, Farming and Real Estate. These sound like they could be very profitable ventures.

Could you please provide more details about these businesses? For example, what would be the expected return on investment? And how long would it typically take to see a return?

Also, if there are any other business opportunities that might be suitable for my portfolio, I'd love to hear about them.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Tania
